article_title: Letter: Persecution of Christians is real

article_metadata.description: Catherine Rampell’s column published on April 28 (“ ‘Crybully’ Trump, supporters, great at playing the victim”) declares that 70 percent of white evangelical Protestants believe that discrimination against Christians is as bad as discrimination against other groups. How dare those white Protestants? And by the way, this Catholic also believes the same thing.The war against Christians is real. Obamacare mandates are trying to force Christians to go
